body:
Comment 2: 
You shouldn't be able to use C types as receivers anyway.  They're not your types to
define the methods for.  They're from another package - "C".

Instead, you should either define functions or create your own types and define methods
on those.  See $GOROOT/misc/cgo/stdio/file.go for an example.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
